cleaned_text: Services Essential Oils What is Aromatherapy? Aromatherapy describes the use of essential oils-aromatic compounds extracted from fragrant plants for emotional and physical healing. 1 drop of an essential oil contains up to 300 powerful life changing chemicals that are naturally found in plants that fight infection, boost your immune system and support your body. Essential Oils do not contain any nutritional value like vitamins and minerals. Essentials Oils may be used in 3 ways: 1) Inhalation 2) Topical 3) Internal Consumption
